title: Preparation for parenthood
creator_credit: Thora James, Frank Wells and J. Arthur Rank Organisation
brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Physiology of Human Reproduction”.
The changes which take place in the body during puberty are shown followed by a brief resume of development of the embryo, lactation, menstruation and how multiple births may occur.
creator_credit_for_label: Thora James, Frank Wells and J. Arthur Rank Organisation
